programme.title: Court 7: Singles & Doubles Second Round - Day 3 - Tennis | Tokyo 2020 Replays
programme.desc: This event took place on 26/07/2021 at the Ariake Tennis Park, Tokyo. It includes the Men's Singles, Women's Singles, Men's Doubles and Women's Doubles Second Round.

programme.title: ‘The Guy in the Mirror is Usually the One Stopping You’ | We Are King
programme.desc: Carlos Junior, the team captain and best pro prospect has 13 brothers and sisters, 4 are living with him and his dad in the Bronx. A semi-pro club in Spain offered him a contract but he made the promise to Jake and his MLK family to get them that 20th win. Maynor, also from Honduras, is taking care of his disabled mother. After a shaky start to the season, he comes into his own against Upper West Side rival Beacon.

programme.title: Semi-Finals & Finals - Day 5 - Swimming | Tokyo 2020 Replays
programme.desc: This event took place on 29/07/2021 at the Tokyo Aquatics Centre,Tokyo. It includes the Men's 800m Freestyle, the Men's 200m Breaststroke, the Women's 200m Butterfly, the Men's 100m Freestyle, the Women's 4 x 200m Freestyle Relay Finals and their Victory Ceremonies as well as the Women's 100m Freestyle, Men's 200m Backstroke, Women's 200m Breaststroke and Men's 200m Individual Medley Semifinals. Finke (USA) claimed the Gold in the 800m Freestyle, Stubblety-Cook (AUS) in the Men's 200m Breaststroke, Zhang (CHN) in the Womens 200m Butterfly, Dressel (USA) in the 100m Freestyle an CHN in the 4x200m Freestyle Relay Final.

programme.title: Trap Finals - Shooting | Tokyo 2020 Replays
programme.desc: This event took place on 29/07/2021 at the Asaka Shooting Range, Tokyo. Rehak Stefecekova (SVK) claimed the Gold in the Women's Trap and Liptak (CZE) in the Men's Trap competiton.

programme.title: HUN v ROC / SWE v FRA - Women's Preliminaries - Handball | Tokyo 2020 Replays
programme.desc: This match took place on 29/07/2021 at the Yoyogi National Stadium, Tokyo.

programme.title: ‘The Guy in the Mirror is Usually the One Stopping You’ | We Are King
programme.desc: Carlos Junior, the team captain and best pro prospect has 13 brothers and sisters, 4 are living with him and his dad in the Bronx. A semi-pro club in Spain offered him a contract but he made the promise to Jake and his MLK family to get them that 20th win. Maynor, also from Honduras, is taking care of his disabled mother. After a shaky start to the season, he comes into his own against Upper West Side rival Beacon.

programme.title: ‘You Not Really about it’ | We Are King
programme.desc: MLK high school has been unstoppable this year. They are about to achieve an undefeated season. But Coach Jake is getting increasingly tense. While some players like Charles are doing great both at school and on the team, others like goalkeeper Raymond are struggling to keep their nerves, putting the whole team at risks. Raymond is trying to live up to the dreams and expectations of his father, a talented goalkeeper himself who never made it pro. Soon the team faces a decisive game which will determine the number one seed in the playoffs.

programme.title: ‘We’re the Best Team in New York City’ | We Are King
programme.desc: City soccer is very special in New-York City and MLK sits at the top, with 19 titles in 25 years. The team is off to a new season and gunning for its 20th title. Coach Jake and assistant Kamani welcome the team for their first practice and super-pro prospect Carlos Lainez is back from Spain. TThey will soon play the top Ohio State team. After a rough start, the team is taking shape but it’s a 16 match competition before the play-offs begin.

programme.title: ‘This is What We Live For’ | We Are King
programme.desc: MLK finally enters the playoffs. Three more games separate the team from their goal but their starting goalkeeper is now suspended. Assistant coach Kimani, both the kids’ chief on-field instructor and off-field confidant, manages to keep the team in balance. His patience combined with Jake’s drive are a perfect match. Defender Vakaba, who has come to New York City to fulfil his dream, joins the team and becomes an essential part of its success.

programme.title: ‘The Only Game that Matter is the Last One’ | We Are King
programme.desc: Can we tell a King player from another player just by his look?. A storybook season must end in storybook fashion. But as MLK is leading in semi-final, top player Carlos get a yellow card against their long-time rivals Beacon. Jake's obsession is now turning into superstition as he makes a final call that will soon turn the team fortune. Maynor, who had seemed to struggle in front of the goal since the start of the season, is proving to be a decisive striker.

programme.title: HUN v ROC / SWE v FRA - Women's Preliminaries - Handball | Tokyo 2020 Replays
programme.desc: This match took place on 29/07/2021 at the Yoyogi National Stadium, Tokyo.

programme.title: ESP v ARG - Men's Preliminaries - Basketball | Tokyo 2020 Replays
programme.desc: This Preliminary Round Game took place on 29/07/2021 at the Saitama Super Arena, Saitama. Final score ESP 81:71 ARG.

programme.title: Table 1: Women's Singles Finals - Table Tennis | Tokyo 2020 Replays
programme.desc: This event took place on 29/07/2021 at the Tokyo Metropolitan Gymnasium, Tokyo. Chen (CHN) claimed the Gold, Sun (CHN) the Silver and Ito (JPN) completed the podium.

Jake's obsession is now turning into superstition as he makes a final call that will soon turn the team fortune. programme.title: Pairs, Lightweight Double Sculls, Single Sculls - Rowing | Tokyo 2020 Replays
programme.desc: This event took place on 29/07/2021 at the Sea Forest Waterway, Tokyo. It includes the Men's and Women's Pair Finals, the Lightweight Men's and Women's Double Sculls Finals and their Victory Ceremonies as well as the Men's and Womens Single Sculls Finals F/E and D.

programme.title: My Great Olympic Moments with Rulon Gardner
programme.desc: From farmboy in Wyoming to taking down the unbeaten, unbeatable Russian for the Olympic gold! Rulon Gardner not only conquered Aleksandr Karelin, he has stared down death at least 3 times. Join Olympic Channel for a riveting, deeply emotional rewind with Rulon. Every minute of his Sydney 2000 Olympic gold and Athens 2004 Olympic bronze. The cheers and tears!

programme.title: Table 1: Men's Singles Finals - Table Tennis | Tokyo 2020 Replays
programme.desc: This event took place on 30/07/2021 at the Tokyo Metropolitan Gymnasium, Tokyo. It includes the Mens Singles Bronze Medal Match Min (TPE) v Ovtcharov (GER) with the later claiming Bronze and the men's Individual Gold Medal Match between Fan (CHN) and Ma (CHN) in which Ma claimed the Gold.

programme.title: Mat 1: Women's +78kg, Men's +100kg Repechages/Semi-Finals/Finals - Judo | Tokyo 2020 Replays
programme.desc: This event took place on 30/07/2021 at the Nippon Budokan, Tokyo. Sone (JPN) claimed the Gold in the Women's +78kg and KRPALEK (CZE) in the Men's +100kg.

programme.title: Blue/Finals Piste: Men's Epee Bronze & Gold Medal Bouts - Fencing | Tokyo 2020 Replays
programme.desc: This event took place on 30/07/2021 at the Makuhari Messe Hall B, Chiba. It includes the Men's Epee Team Finals and the Victory Ceremony. JPN claimed the Gold, ROC Silver and KOR completed the podium.

programme.title: My Great Olympic Moments with Rulon Gardner
programme.desc: From farmboy in Wyoming to taking down the unbeaten, unbeatable Russian for the Olympic gold! Rulon Gardner not only conquered Aleksandr Karelin, he has stared down death at least 3 times. Join Olympic Channel for a riveting, deeply emotional rewind with Rulon. Every minute of his Sydney 2000 Olympic gold and Athens 2004 Olympic bronze. The cheers and tears!

programme.title: Rulon | Five Rings Films
programme.desc: At the 2000 Olympic Games, American wrestler Rulon Gardner beat the unbeatable and became an overnight sensation. But what came after the ‘Miracle on the Mat’ was even more unpredictable.

programme.title: Women's Singles QFs & Mix Doubles Bronze Medal - Badminton | Tokyo 2020 Replays
programme.desc: This event took place on 30/07/2021 at the Musashino Forest Sport Plaza, Tokyo. It includes Women's Singles Quarterfinals and the Mixed Doubles Bronze Medal Match, in which WATANABE Yuta and HIGASHINO Arisa (JPN) beat TANG Chun Man & TSE Ying Suet (HKG) to take the Bronze medal.

programme.title: Court 1: Mens Doubles Bronze Medal, Mixed Doubles Semi-Final - Tennis | Tokyo 2020 Replays
programme.desc: This event took place on 30/07/2021 at the Ariake Tennis Park, Tokyo. It includes the Men's Doubles Bronze Medal Match Krajikec/Sandgreen (USA) v Daniell/Venus (NZL) with Daniell/Venus (NZL) claiming the medal and the Mixed Doubles Semifinals Pavlyuchenkova/Rublev (ROC) v Barty/Peers (AUS) & Vesnina/Karatsev (ROC) v Stojanovic/Djokovic (SRB)
